Aim : The aim trial determine whether whole-body vibration ( WBV ) induce via non-invasive oscillation platform could improve symptom health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) patient chronic functional constipation . 2 . Methods : A single-blinded , randomized , control trial perform single Hospital Taiwan . Patients diagnose chronic functional constipation , per Rome III diagnostic criterion include randomize either WBV treatment treatment ( control ) group . The treatment group receive six 15-minute session WBV therapy two-week period . Patients receive vibration 2 mm amplitude frequency 12 Hz . The primary outcome assess constipation severity instrument ( CSI ) . The secondary outcome improvement HRQOL .
DOC.criteria: meet Rome III criterion constipation pregnant cardiovascular disease cerebrovascular disease recently undergone major surgery hypothyroidism depressive disorder .
